title: [Gleyminn Anni River, Island]
description: Deserted nests cling to remnants of a tree's fallen branches, the post of a cracked wooden sign half buried in mud splintered and angled towards a fungus-laden rotted fishing dock behind a tiny hut crafted from mud, sticks, and stone.  Beyond the dock, a slow-moving stream traverses the small island, feeding from the river into a small lake on the other side.
